title: Nelson's Island
credit_line: Received from the Carnegie Museum of Natural History in exchange for Works from the Robert S. Waters Estate
provenance_text: Historical Society of Western Pennsylvania, Pittsburgh, PA, 1885, until c.1897; Carnegie Institute Museum of Natural History, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1916; on loan to Carnegie Library, Pittsburgh, PA, 1916 -1975; Recieved from the Carnegie Museum of Natural History in exchange for works from the Robert S. Waters Estate, 1975
